body:
Hi Anthony,

There is a problem under OS X, which doesn't have a /usr/tmp
directory.  This has been fixed in the latest release (I think), but
maybe not the one you have.  The solution is to execute "sudo ln -s /
var/tmp /usr" and enter the administrator's password.

There should have been a note about this spat out by makeall, but
maybe you missed it.

-Greg
